name: Intruders (Miniiee)
description:
A little magician tower defense game. You are going to fight with the elements. Only the opposites can damage, so be sharp. Have Fun!

Used Assets:

All assets are free, except one, the farm house, which I purchased.

https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/3d/environments/urban/hq-retro-farmhouse-m...

https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/audio/sound-fx/96-general-library-free-sam...

https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/audio/sound-fx/foley/fantasy-sfx-for-parti...

https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/essentials/tutorial-projects/unity-particl...

https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/vfx/particles/powerup-particles-16458

https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/3d/props/exterior/low-poly-fence-pack-6166...

https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/3d/environments/landscapes/low-poly-simple...

Animations and models made with Mixamo.

This is a PC VR build. Made for Oculus Quest 2.
